text.__SUMMARY__: The Belgaum worm snake (Indotyphlops exiguus) is a harmless blind snake species found in India. No subspecies are currently recognized.
text.Geographic range: Found in southwestern India where it is known only from Belgaum in the state of Karnataka. The type locality given is "Indes orientalis" [East Indies].
